name: TestsForNeisseriaGonorrhoeaeOfUnspecifiedSiteReportedByPresence
title: Tests for Neisseria gonorrhoeae of unspecified site reported by presence
description: tests for Neisseria gonorrhoeae by any method collected from an unspecified anatomical site that reports as present/absent only
purpose: (Clinical Focus: presence of Neisseria gonorrhoeae infection at an unspecified anatomical site),(Data Element Scope: Observation.code),(Inclusion Criteria: non-deprecated LOINCs for microbiology tests (Class:MICRO) which detect (Property:PrThr) neisseria gonorrhoeae organism, Ag, rRNA, or DNA (Component) from unspecified sites (System) at a point in time (Timing:Pt) that are reported (OrderObs:Both or Observation) with an ordinal scale result (Scale:Ord).),(Exclusion Criteria: No Exclusions)
